subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Cancer
lead_paragraph: After missing two months of this season to fight recurrent cancer, Kay Yow returned to N.C. State’s bench in late January, becoming only the sixth Division I women’s coach to win 700 games.
snippet: After missing two months of this season to fight recurrent cancer, Kay Yow returned to N.C. State’s bench in late January, becoming only the sixth Division I women’s coach to win 700 games.
